Title: Authorizes a school district in the village of Tuckahoe, by resolution, to limit transportation of students to 7 miles
Summary: Authorizes a school district in the village of Tuckahoe, by resolution, to limit transportation of students to 7 miles.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the transportation of children residing in a school district in the village of Tuckahoe
